attributes.action: VAT to be lifted on Piles cream
attributes.additional_details:
There is only one thing that hurts more than Piles.  Paying VAT to cure it.  Should your bum grapes be earning the government a pretty penny?  I think not.  Let's lessen the pain of haemorroids, buy lessening the cost of haemorrhoids.

Let Preparation H be prepared at an affordable price.  Let families be able to budget for Germalots of Germaloids.

No to VAT on Piles cream.
